card.name: Waterlogged Archipelago
card.text: {T}, Pay 2 life, Sacrifice this land: Searh your library for a Plains or Island card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

card.name: Contaminated Rivulet
card.text: {T}, Pay 2 life, Sacrifice this land: Searh your library for an Island or Swamp card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

card.name: Sanguinary Morass
card.text: {T}, Pay 2 life, Sacrifice this land: Searh your library for a Swamp or Mountain card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

card.name: Wildwood Knolls
card.text: {T}, Pay 2 life, Sacrifice this land: Searh your library for a Mountain or Forest card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

card.name: Blustery Steppe
card.text: {T}, Pay 2 life, Sacrifice this land: Searh your library for a Forest or Plains card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

card.name: Stark Wetland
card.text: {T}, Pay 2 life, Sacrifice this land: Searh your library for a Plains or Swamp card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

card.name: Vexed Waterfront
card.text: This land enters tapped. {T}: Add {W} or {U}. {3}{W}{U}: Until end of turn, this land becomes a 3/4 white and blue Elemental creature with flying. It's still a land. Whenever this land attacks, draw a card.

card.name: Vexed Mire
card.text: This land enters tapped. {T}: Add {U} or {B}. {1}{U}{B}: Until end of turn, this land becomes a 2/3 blue and black Elemental creature with skulk. It's still a land. Whenever this land deals combat damage to a player, that player loses 2 life.

card.name: Vexed Fen
card.text: This land enters tapped. {T}: Add {B} or {R}. {B}{R}: Until end of turn, this land becomes a 1/2 black and red Elemental creature with deathtouch. It's still a land. Whenever this land attacks, discard a card, then draw a card.

card.name: Vexed Temple
card.text: This land enters tapped. {T}: Add {R} or {W}. {1}{R}{W}: This land becomes a 3/2 red and white Elemental creature with first strike until end of turn. It's still a land. Whenever this land attacks, it deals 2 damage to each opponent and you gain 2 life.

card.name: Greed Vadcuum
card.text: Choose one - • Counter target spell with mana value 3 or greater. • Exile target permanent with mana value 3 or greater.

card.name: Nightblade Ronin
card.text: Flash When this creature enters, return target nonland permanent with mana value X or less to its owner's hand, then that player discards a card and loses 2 life.

card.name: Candlelit Scourge
card.text: Flying When this creature enters, each player sacrifices a nontoken creature. Blitz {1}{B}{R} (If you cast this spell for its blitz cost, it gains haste and “When this creature dies, draw a card.” Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.)

card.name: Botanical Behemoth
card.text: Trample, haste Whenever this creature enters or attacks, put two +1/+1 counters on it. When this creature dies, it deals damage equal to its power to up to one target creature.

card.name: Menagerie Caretaker
card.text: {T}: Add one mana of any color. Whenever you cast your second creature spell each turn, create a Spirited Companion token. (It's a {1}{W} 1/1 Dog enchantment creature with "When this creature enters, draw a card."

card.name: Mindrake Trawler
card.text: When this creature enters, target opponent reveals their hand and you choose a nonland card from it. Exile that card. When this creature dies, target opponent creates a Clue token. (It’s an artifact with “{2}, Sacrifice this token: Draw a card.”)

card.name: Emergent Penmanship
card.text: When this enchantment enters, you may discard a card. If you do, draw a card.

card.name: Resplendent Chargers
card.text: Trample, haste When this creature enters, create X 2/2 red Human Knight creature tokens with trample and haste. Until end of turn, whenever one or more creatures you control deal combat damage to a player, draw a card.

card.name: Terramancy
card.text: Exile all land cards from your graveyard, then sacrifice all lands you control, then put all cards exiled this way onto the battlefield under your control.

card.name: Bloodblitz Battle-Axe
card.text: Equipped creature gets +1/+0 and has haste. Equip - Pay 3 life.

card.name: Mox Bismuth
card.text: When this artifact enters, you may exile an artifact card from your hand. {T}: Add one mana of any of the exiled card's colors.

card.name: Vivacious Ridgeline
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. {2}: This land becomes a 2/2 Elemental creature until end of turn. It's still a land. {2}: Put a +1/+1 counter on this land.

card.name: Ulamog, Voracious Calamity
card.text: When you cast this spell, each player sacrifices all permanents they control that are one or more colors. Indestructible. Annihilator 4 (Whenever this creature attacks, defending player sacrifices four permanents of their choice.)

card.name: Omicranial Clamp
Chromatic Lotus
card.text: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add three mana of any color. When this artifact is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, draw a card.

card.name: Worldcarver Crucible
card.text: {T}, Sacrifice a land: Return target land card from your graveyard to the battlefield. {2}: Untap this artifact.

card.name: Coveted Key
card.text: {1}, {T}: Untap target nonland permanent. {2}, {T}: You gain 2 life. {3}, {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card. {4}, {T}: Create a Treasure token.

card.name: Insidious Mask
Starlight Cairn
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. Metalcraft - {T}: Add three mana in any combination of colors. Activate only if you control 3 or more artifacts.

card.name: Multiform Mauler
card.text: This creature enters with X +1/+1 counters on it. When this creature dies, create a 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying and draw a card for each +1/+1 counter on this creature. Remove a +1/+1 counter from this creature: It deals 1 damage to any target. {1}, {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.

card.name: Karn's Bauble
card.text: {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add {C}. This mana can't be spent to cast a nonartifact spell. Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkkeep.

card.name: Flooded Abyss
card.text: Vanishing 3 (This land enters with three time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter from it. When the last is removed, sacrifice it.) When this land enters, exile target land an opponent controls until this land leaves the battlefield.

card.name: Terramorphic Vista
card.text: As this land enters, choose a basic land type. Then you may pay 1 life. If you don't, it enters tapped. This land is the chosen type.

card.name: Prosperous Lotus
card.text: {T}: Add three mana in any combination of colors. {3}: Draw a card.
